body: Now to wait patiently for the translation...
this is very nice, personally, i would have liked it more if it was Akko and Lotte/Amanda

@kamitokaryusai Yep. This is definitely his artstyle. Too bad it ain't labeled as such. Accurate tagging and giving artists credit has always been pretty awful on this site. Granted, this is also the site that gets practically everything ever uploaded ever, and I can't say I've ever been hit with surprise scat or snuff, so there's that.
wait....this isn't drawn by kamirenjaku sanpei?
Yeah, I've personally always favored the Sucy x Akko pairing over DiAkko. But all three would be even better still. Then again, why stop there? ;)
